name: The Ticking Time Bomb
description:
The Ticking Time bomb was made in one week for the Brackeys game jam. The goal of the game is to locate and defuse the bomb and then arrest the bomber. They're three endings. There are not a lot of sounds due to time restrictions and there are a few small glitches - nothing game breaking though.

Controls:

A-D to move around

E - to interact

Space - to continue a conversation
